Name: Venkel
Review Text: Small establishment with very good salads! Healthy food with elaborated mixes. The homemade bread (more like a cake) with hummus is great! As well as the smoothies! …

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Good prices for large portions. Healthy food with seasonal veg and other flavors. …

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Delicious, creative and seasonal food prepared with love. I have been a couple of times with my girlfriend and it is always equally high quality. Our favorites are the banana bread,  pumpkin soup and the fall dishes.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Very good salads and good sizes. You can make your own salad for 8.50€ which, for the size, is pretty good. I like the atmosphere and decoration as well. The staff was very flexible with offering a vegan alternative. I will definitely come again (:

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Amazing and really cute place. The ingredients used are really fresh and actually on display, which is refreshing. It's well priced and extremely tasty. On top of that the staff is very nice and friendly. Would definitely reccomend it!

Name: Venkel
Review Text: If you are looking for a healthy and wholesome meal in de pijp in Amsterdam, Venkel is made for you. The card offers a wide range of warm and cold salads we well as some soup options made to order with fresh produce. The place offers a cosy atmosphere, so feel free to bring a book or a laptop and spend an hour or two over there

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Super friendly staff, nice variety in the menu. Good prices for healthy food. Options for vegan and vegetarians. Food came quick too, despite being fresh.

Name: Venkel
Review Text:
This was our second time at this place. Again DELICIOUS !! & felt healthy.
For us it’s rare to find places that are hip feeling and tastes as good as traditional/established dishes. (Had lentil soup, salmon salad and veggie meat ball salad)

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Very cosy place, Friendly staff, very tasty seasonal meals. Loved it!

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Amazing salads for lunch or dinner that satisfy with decently sized portions. Quality ingredients and a elegant combination of tastes that cater for nearly all diet preferences! Take away or dine in the casual cafe setting.

Name: Venkel
Review Text:
Really lovely and comfy environment,
Good food and definitely try the lemonade!

Name: Venkel
Review Text: The green one is with Boerenkool (typically Dutch), orange, apple and ginger. Just the healthy (€5,-) shot I needed.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Great food and very healthy ! Can recommend

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Amazing salads for lunch or dinner that satisfy with decently sized portions. Quality ingredients and a elegant combination of tastes that cater for nearly all diet preferences! Take away or dine in the casual cafe setting.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: This was my favorite place to eat during my short trip to Netherlands. The menu is amazing with cool interesting salads, smoothies and desserts. The atmosphere is most relaxing and the people working there are super friendly.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Had a very good winter salad there. Decent-sized portion. Also tried the hummus with home made bread. Everything was good, but the bread in particular was delicious. Friendly service.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Really tasty and interesting salads! Fresh grilled chicken breast/halloumi for our orders. Cauliflower soup was so flavorful. Very cute. Friendly staff.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Very cosy and well designed place. It's not for mainstream people, this place is for amateurs of whole, simple and natural food. Our dishes were really interesting and tasty. I loved watching the working chefs there and enjoyed how they making food for me. The idea with open space with kitchen is excellent. Totally recommend!

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Amazing place! The salads at Venkel are amazing, so creative with many different fresh ingredients. The portion size was just right, super filling and not too small as in many other salad bars often the case. Also loved the fact that there is free water for everyone. I’m definitely coming back here!

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Nice and cozy place. Their salads are delicious! Also, lots of gluten free options. Highly recommended if you’re looking for a healthy alternative.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Perfect place for quality salads. Healthy, large servings and I think they change their menu every season

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Fantastic apple pie and pork belly quiche! For a restaurant located in one of the more expensive neighborhoods in Amsterdam, the prices are quite cheap. One piece of apple pie is around 4 euros. A small pork belly quiche with a salad is 6 …

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Wow that's a lot of food. Had a nice spinach and mushroom salad which was filling and then got to take the rest home with me. Ambience is really nice here and I do want to try more things on the menu.Solid lunch option.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Salad tasted nice but too small of a portion/not enough substance. I had to order a muffin to be satisfied. Nice atmosphere though. Clean, relaxed.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: A really great find! Was very quiet and empty, but that didn’t reflect the quality of the place. The food was great - especially if you are vegan, GF, and other dietary needs.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: I like this place a lot, very good healthy food, friendly staff and nice atmosfeer.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Tasty, healthy, fresh! Creative salads, a welcome lunch alternative in Amsterdam, plus very attentive service! Integrated "raw" decor is also nicely done.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Great food and very healthy ! Can recommend

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Very mediocre, bland salad for too much money. The dressing for the salad was non existent, and the flavours just didn't come together. The staff was friendly, but unfortunately it can't make up for this sorry salad.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Flavor combinations are very good. One of my favorite go-to places for healthy fast food, when I don't want to cook myself.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Too good! Loved hommus&bread a lot.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: I had a delicious salad bowl made of fresh and tasty ingredients, mostly locally sourced. Perfect for a healthy meal

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Amazing salads and calming atmosphere.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Best vegetarian lunch place. Salads are delicious and served in generous portions. The space is quiet and reserved.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Great vegetarian options, fresh juices, choose your own salad with variety of ingredients, good place for lunch next to museums square

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Nice staff and very laid-back atmosphere but I was not particularly impressed by the salad there. There is this DIY option but I did not try it out.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Affordable (for Amsterdam) delicious salads of all kinds (vegan too!) and an amazing ambient to top it all off!

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Had one of the best dishes I’ve ever had! Well done, and a lovely atmosphere.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Amazing salads. Very unique and fresh. Great service and cozy restaurant.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Tasty, freshly made healthy food and nice ambience in the heart of De Pijp. Perfect lunch spot.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: A fantastic healthy and largely vegetarian restaurant with the best chai I have ever had!

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Best Salad Place in town. Almost everything Gluten free

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Great salads and a nice place to do work. A little pricey

Name: Venkel
Review Text: The truly healthy place you are looking at. Plus, pricing is really reasonable, environment is very friendly and service is truly customer oriented.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: They have the most amazing and tasty healthy food ever!!

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Great healthy food in a nice location. Service is great

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Really healthy place with salads to take a break for lunch after visit the Albert Cuyp Market.

Name: Venkel
Review Text: Nice atmosphere but the food was found lacking flavor and consistency.
